name: ABSUDOO
description:
INSTRUCTIONS :

   Every player will choose a number and a location where he is willing to place it .
   The player who put down a number just near another same number will lose
   Players have to memorise the numbers in each location to make it harder for both    sides, and  frequently every 5 moves the table will be showed to the players to            help  both sides memorising it.
  Therefore making it a little easier :) :)
